description.en: A wholesome BL story featuring a cute devil!

altTitles.en: Legend of the Angel of Love: Wedding Peach

description.en:
There are three known worlds: the human world, the angel world, and the devil world. The evil queen Raindevilla yearns to destroy the angel world with help or her many devil minions. The goddess Aphrodite sends an angel to the human world, Limone, to summon three love angels in the form of three school girls, Momoko Hanasaki, Yuri Tanima, and Hinagiku Tamano, who together become Angel Lilly, Angel Daisy, and Wedding Peach. The three girls must fight to overcome the evils of the devils, as well as their own lives, and restore peace to the angel world by gathering all pieces of the Sacred Four Somethings (or Saint Something Four) and defeat the evil queen once and for all.  
  
___
One day, Momoko is attacked by Pluie, a demon who's after her keepsake ring left by her mother. Just then, the angel Limone gives Momoko the Sacred Mirror, allowing her to transform into the legendary Love Angel Wedding Peach and drive away demons! And so, Peach and her fellow angels fight to protect the lovers of the world from demons pursuing them for their "wave of love"...!
___
Chapter number do not match up but nothing is missing.

description.en: A twenty-year-old with little hope for the future discovers a shop that buys lifespan, time, and health. This is a story dealing with the ensuing consequences.
description.ru:
Парень, у которого туго с деньгами, узнает про магазин, где можно продать время жизни. Отдав свои года, он в отчаянии приходит к пониманию ценности жизни.   
Основано на новелле "Три дня счастья" от Сугару Мияки.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Offical English Translation of the Novel](https://yenpress.com/9781975314217/three-days-of-happiness/)  
- [Original Story](http://vgperson.tumblr.com/post/51261981076/three-days-of-happiness)  
- [Novelization the Manga is Based On](http://vgperson.tumblr.com/post/71910368589/sugaru-miakis-three-days-of-happiness-part-1)  
- [Official German](https://www.egmont-manga.de/manga-product/ich-habe-mein-leben-fur-10-000-yen-pro-jahr-verkauft-01/)
description.uk: Бідний і голодний 20-річний Кусунокі знаходить магазин, який купляє у людей життя, час або здоров'я. Почувши, що його життя оцінене в мінімальні десять тисяч єн за рік, він продає усе своє життя, лишивши собі три місяці, щоб насолодитися отриманими грошима.
description.pt-br:
"Eu vendi minha vida por 10 mil yene o ano" é um mangá baseado no romance "Três dias de felicidade" de Miyaki Sugaru, e conta a história de Kusunoki, um jovem com poucas espectativas para o futuro, que com 20 anos chegou ao fundo do poço. Foi forçado a vender até mesmo seus CDs e livros para conseguir dinheiro, nesse dia ele descobre uma loja que compra o tempo de vida, o tempo e a saúde das pessoas.

Essa é uma história do valor de uma vida, e das consequências de vendê-la.

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

description.en:
The 200,000 KM diameter artificial celestial body of APOSIMZ. Most of its volume is its core space, which is covered by a superstructural shell. Fifty centuries ago, the people who lost a war against the core lost their right to reside legitimately in APOSIMZ, and were left behind on the extremely cold surface. They face the spreading Frame disease and aggressive automatons which appear frequently on the ruins level. Yet even so, somehow people survive.  


---
description.pt:
O corpo celeste artificial de 200.000KM de diâmetro, APOSIMZ. A maior parte de seu volume se encontra no espaço de seu núcleo, que é coberto por um escudo de superestrutura. Cinquenta séculos atrás, as pessoas que perderam a guerra contra o núcleo, perderam o direito de residir legalmente em APOSIMZ e foram isoladas na superfície fria. Eles enfrentam propagação da doença dos Frames e autômatos agressivos que aparecem frequentemente no nível das ruínas. Mesmo assim, as pessoas sobrevivem.  


---

**Officially published:**  
- In english by [Kodansha](https://kodanshacomics.com/series/aposimz/) (Print version by [Vertical](http://www.vertical-comics.com/books/aposimz_01.php))

- In italian by [Panini Comics](http://comics.panini.it/notizie/articolo/aposimz/)  
- In german by [Manga Cult](https://www.cross-cult.de/titel/aposimz-land-der-puppen-1.html) as "Aposimz - Land der Puppen"  
  
**Note:** The oneshot was also translated by Kodansha: [Link](https://kodanshacomics.com/chapter/aposimz-prologue/)

description.en:
On that day, I met my destiny.
Kashiko Hinata, an office worker who has never been in love, meets Reika, a beautiful girl with an unknown identity, who says, "I'll do anything, please let me stay here!"

Their shared life together begins. A yuri tale of love and madness, told with beautiful brush strokes, is about to begin!

description.en:
My name is Asagi Kamiyashiro. My last memories of my old life were a night like every other at my part-time job up until an unnamed assailant mercilessly stabbed me. As I was fading into an empty void losing my consciousness, I had an explosive realization of how much I regretted in this life. I never honestly used my degree, I never had a girlfriend, and I lived a pretty quiet life. Day in and day out I worked like I was on clockwork. As the thought of regrets filled my mind, I told myself, if I was reincarnated I would make use of that life to its fullest. That's when a disembodied voice spoke.  
 
_"The desire to be reincarnated confirmed. Granting Unique Skillset: Jack Of all Trades, Master of None"_ 
 
At first, I considered those words to be insulting… But now… Not so much… My story begins in the middle of a foggy grass hill.
description.id: Aku, Asagi Kamiyashiro, diserang oleh perampok saat bekerja paruh waktu. Ketika aku bangun, saya dipindahkan ke dunia lain yang dihuni oleh monster. Aku tidak pernah berpikir saya akan diserang oleh goblin dalam hidupku! Aku berhasil mencapai kota dan memeriksa statusku di Guild Petualang, hanya untuk menemukan bahwa kecepatanku tinggi. Selanjutnya, nama dari skill yang kumiliki adalah "Jack of all trades, master of none"...?
description.ja:
**小説家になろう発!!　異世界最速!? 神速と万能スキルを持つ異世界転移者のファンタジー、開幕!!**

**「異世界に来た僕は器用貧乏で素早さ頼りな旅をする｣
異世界転移した転移者の素早さ極振りの楽勝ライフが漫画に！**
 
 
アルバイト中に強盗に襲われた僕、上代朝霧。次に目を覚ましたのは、異世界だった。空腹に耐えられず、ひとまず向かった森でゴブリンに遭遇。しかし、なぜだか上手く武器を使え、撃退に成功する!!

　その後も狼に追われたりしつつも、何とか町へと到着。そこでギルドに加入し、依頼をこなしていたら、素早さの数値が異常に上昇していることが発覚!!だから、僕はこの素早さと器用(貧乏)さを武器に、この世界で生きることを決めるのだが――

　異世界最速の転生者が駆け抜けるファンタジーライフ、開幕!!
description.pt-br: Tarde da noite, no meio do meu trabalho de meio período em uma loja de conveniência, tive um encontro com um ladrão e fui impiedosamente morto a facadas. Quando estava prestes a perder minha consciência, pensei o quanto eu queria fazer isso e aquilo quando ouvi uma voz... 'O desejo de ser convocado foi confirmado. Concedendo habilidade única. 'Valete para toda obra, Mestre de ninguém.'' Palavras rudes como essas foram ditas.  Jack de todos os comércios, mestre de ninguém? Não mexa comigo! Esses pensamentos e desejos foram em vão quando minha consciência se desvaneceu, quando eu acordei estava em uma colina verde e nevoenta.

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en:
19-year-old Shibao Endo, a high school graduate and currently a ronin, suddenly stumbles upon a beautiful young girl dressed in a unique outfit. After being forced to hide her from the pursuing police, he ends up losing his virginity by chance!  
  
The start of exciting and stormy days in Shibao Endo and a delinquent girl's secret love story!  
  
[Preview Chapter 1 (in Japanese) here.](http://www.shonengahosha.co.jp/tachiyomi/ScrollView_pt0005d71d2509fa71/)
description.ja:
遠藤柴生19歳浪人生の前に突然転がり込んできたのは特攻服を着たヤンキーの
美少女。警察から匿ってくれとたのみこまれ、行きずりで童貞を奪われること
に！犬系男子とヤンキー女子のちょっぴりHな秘密のラブストーリ
 
--- 
 
Endō Shiba nama 19-sai rōnin-sei no mae ni totsuzen korogarikonde kita no wa tokkō-fuku o kita yankī no bishōjo. Keisatsu kara kakumatte kure to tanomikoma re, yukizuri de dōtei o ubawa reru koto ni! Inu-kei danshi to yankī joshi no choppiri Hna himitsu no rabusutōri.

Yadda Yadda Seven-doors, the Humanoid 7D-O, and Her Friends

altTitles.ja: ななどなどなど

description.en:
After being nicknamed "Yinkyahime/Princess Goth Chick" (陰キャ or Yin character, opposite of Yang) because of her behavior in elementary school, Komachi Tamamura spent three years as a hikikomori. Since she continued to ditch even after in high school, her sister Chacha sent her Nanado Nado Nado, a friendship android to lead Komachi back to real life interactions in school!  
  
Komachi gained some friends when she started playing a game app, and eventually returned to school even though reluctant. She has a negative prejudice to many things in the world due to the knowledge she gained on the Internet in her young age. She's not good at studying or playing sports, but is great at tsukkomi.  
  
Nanado's official name is "Code 7D-O", but she is rarely called that. She is bright and optimistic, and doesn't think too much about things. She can perform general living activities such as talking and eating, just like humans, so that she does not seem to be an android. While she can emit a beam from the eyes and has 100 language modes, she does not have enough arithmetic functions for high school.   
  
*[Based on MTL ofJapanese Wikipedia page.](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AA%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9)*

altTitles.ja: お待ちください、領主様！

altTitles.es: Ah, por favor sea paciente, ¡mi señor!

description.en:
Rose is the ruler of the dominion of ‘White’, a small and poor land. She was getting along with her citizens and living a quaint, favorable life until foreign migrants kept increasing and she got involved in some odd situations?! The lively, entertaining, romance, fantasy story of a super OP ruler Rose and Yggdrasil, the grand sorcerer who wants to hide her away and protect her!

---
When the Kingdom of White was conquered 500 years ago, the king and his subjects were exiled to a small tract of wasteland covered in ice. There they endured cold and hunger, relying on the magic of Archmage Yggdrasil to build the world’s smallest self-governing territory. As the last heir to her family, Rose now rules over this land as its lord. Rescuing former citizens who have fallen prey to trafficking abroad, she pours her heart and soul into making them thrive at home. But first things first, she must fill up the treasury to fund this mission! The business-savvy lord invites dragons, dwarfs, and elves to join in the effort, turning White into a haven for all races. Yggdrasil couldn’t be prouder of this utopia in the making, but will Lord Rose ever get to leave her money troubles behind?

---

막강 능력 영주님 ‘로즈’와 그녀를 영지에 몰래몰래 숨겨 놓고 보호하고픈 스승, ‘대마법사 이그드라실’의 유쾌 발랄 로맨스 판타지!

露丝·白是贫寒的白领地领主，她的身边有大魔法师伊格·德拉希尔辅佐。身为白的老师，他担任着领地的各种职务。为了领地的繁荣露丝不断尝试各种冒险，然而异族渐渐踏入领地，也因此带来各种问题...乐天女领主该如果解决迎面而来的难题呢？

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

title.en: Tsugi wa Ii yo ne, Senpai

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsugi wa Ii yo ne, Senpai

description.en: Mao, who had repeated a year for some reason, decided to start over in the second year of high school. Hachiya, a junior high school boy in the soccer club, became in the same class as Mao who repeated a year. Even though he is in the same grade as her he doesn’t break his honorifics, in which Mao found difficult, but…

Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.

When monsters attack the world, a small portion of the population discovers special powers that help them fight these monsters. Of this group, one man stands out above them all. Taehun Kim’s experience as a special forces soldier makes him a deadly hunter of monsters, both human and non-human. But when a magical artifact prophesizes Taehun’s death several years in the future, he must fight to change his fate, and the fate of the world. Can Taehun and his team survive this apocalyptic wasteland?

description.fr:
Le monde que nous connaissons n’est plus qu’un lointain souvenir. Sur les ruines de la civilisation, des monstres sont apparus : une fois abattus, ils libèrent des gemmes de pouvoir. Taehoon, un ancien agent des forces spéciales, se retrouve à faire équipe avec Hyunwook, un lycéen et joueur de baseball. Ensemble, ils n’ont qu’un objectif : récupérer le maximum de gemmes de pouvoir pour augmenter leurs capacités, et survivre. La quête des chasseurs a commencé !

Ketika monster menyerang dunia, beberapa orang mendapatkan kekuatan spesial yang membantu mereka melawan monster ini. Dari kelompok ini, satu orang menonjol di atas mereka semua. Pengalaman Taehoon Kim sebagai prajurit pasukan khusus membuatnya menjadi pemburu monster yang mematikan. Tapi ketika artefak magis meramalkan kematian Taehoon beberapa tahun di masa depan, dia harus berjuang untuk mengubah nasibnya bersamaan dengan nasib dunia. Bisakah Taehoon dan timnya selamat dari akhir dunia?

특수 부대 요원이었던 김태훈, 자동차 워셔액을 사기 위해서 마트에 들어갔다가 몬스터들을 맞닥뜨리게 된다.

살아남기 위해 몬스터들과 싸우며, 고교 야구 선수 방현욱을 만나 몬스터들을 하나씩 처치해 나간다.

description.pt-br: O mundo mudou e o povo também. 31 de dezembro de 2016, o dia anterior ao ano novo. Kim Taehoon estava apenas casualmente comprando mantimentos no shopping. Mas então, monstros apareceram de repente do nada. Com suas habilidades altamente treinadas que ele ganhou com sua ocupação anterior, ele começa a caçar os monstros e consegue vencer, salvando inúmeras pessoas que também estavam no shopping. Mas há mais, e eles não param de chegar. Ele seria capaz de sobreviver até o fim? Ele seria capaz de vencer a quantidade incontável de monstros que só parecem ficar mais fortes? E seriam apenas monstros com os quais ele precisa se preocupar? Esta é a história de Kim Tae-Hoon, um dos primeiros caçadores a se levantar durante uma época em que os monstros começaram a aparecer.

title.en: When I Put Up The Strongest Barrier In The Country, It Became Too Peaceful And I Was Banished. They Did Know That That Barrier Isn’T Permanent, Right?

altTitles.ja: 国に最強のバリアを張ったら平和になりすぎて追放されました。そのバリア、永続じゃないよ？

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuni Ni Saikyo No Barrier Wo Hattara Heiwa Ni Narisugite Tsuiho Saremashita. Sono Barrier, Eizoku Janai Yo?

altTitles.es-la: Cuando Levanté La Barrera Más Fuerte Del País, Se Volvió Demasiado Pacífico Y Me Desterraron. ¿Sabían Que Esa Barrera No Es Permanente, Verdad?

description.en: A Shield that can only use the beginner magic ``Barrier'' and has been looked down upon. Despite putting up an ironclad barrier to protect the country, he is deported due to his fiancé's tricks. However, before he knew it, he had subjugated the strongest dragon (a young girl), was courted by beautiful women from other countries, and was being followed by a group of brutal demons! ? A new type of battle action begins, woven by Shield, a young man who can only protect himself, but whose defense is the strongest! !

The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

title.en: Wandering Witch: The Journey of Elaina

description.en:
Once upon a time, there was a witch named Elaina, who set off on a journey across the world. Along the way, she would meet all kinds of people, from a country full of witches to a giant in love with his own muscles—but with each meeting, Elaina would become a small part of their story, and her own world would get a little bit bigger.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Akasha as **The Journey of Elaina** (2022)
description.id: Melakukan perjalanan tanpa henti, bertemu berbagai macam orang dari berbagai macam negara, serta mengembara demi memenuhi rasa ingin tahu. Inilah kisah pertemuan dan perpisahan penyihir kelabu Elaina.
description.ja: あるところに一人の魔女がいました。名前はイレイナ。彼女は旅人として、これといった目的もなく、色々な国や人と出逢いながら、流されるように気ままな長い旅を続けています。これは、そんな魔女イレイナが紡ぐ、出逢いと別れの物語…。
description.ru: Много лет странствующая ведьма Элейна находится в пути. Неустанно она путешествует по миру, чтобы повидать разные страны, удивительные обычаи и разносторонние проявления человеческой натуры. Сколько историй она может рассказать как их живой свидетель. Давайте же и мы поспешим составить ей компанию!

title.en: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru

altTitles.ja: 山田くんとLv999の恋をする

altTitles.en: My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999

altTitles.pt-br: Minha História de Amor com Yamada-kun Nível 999

description.en:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?

The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
description.ja: 彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?
description.pt-br: Akane Kinoshita pegou seu namorado tendo um caso com uma garota de um jogo online e ficou completamente arrasada. Ela tenta desestressar matando uns bichos no jogo, e acaba desabafando sobre seu caso com Yamada, um jogador de sua guilda — mas ele responde com um "tô nem aí" curto e grosso. Entretanto, quando Akane decide invadir um encontro offline do jogo para se vingar de seu ex-namorado, ela ouve essas palavras marcantes ao vivo, e seu coração bate mais forte ao conhecer Yamada ao vivo...

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: The slice of life story about a chronically depressed ancient witch and her extra cheerful androgynous owl familiar.

In a world that has become brutalized after a massive virus outbreak, some survivors have managed to survive by traveling in small groups. One of these survivors, Seonho, has been quietly living as a two-man group to protect Hae-soo, which is often dismissed as a useless individual. But one day, Seonho’s group is captured by a group of people who enjoy murder, violence, and Sexual Assault as a way of life, and one particularly dangerous man named Won takes an unusual interest in Seonho. Preferred offers Won a deal in exchange for his release...

* This work contains elements of violence, strong language, coercive sexuality, and other elements that should be viewed with caution.
* The contents of the work are all fictional, and the ideas expressed in the work are different from those of the author.

description.en:
From the first volume

The first ever official "Uma Musume" anthology comic!!
The works of such amazing writers are all gathered in this book. Once you read it, you'll end up liking "Uma Musume" even more! Enjoy these 11 stories, filled with cuteness and fun!!

altTitles.ja: 猫耳少女と天才生物学少女の初恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Nekomimi Shojo to Tensai Seibutsugaku Shojo no Hatsukoi

description.en: A short Twitter oneshot about a cat girl and a genius biologist's blooming love.

altTitles.en: Magic Beast Sword Saint ('s Otherworldly Adventure)
Swordmaster of Warcraft: Invasion of the Otherworld

altTitles.es-la: Asesino de bestias magicas de otro mundo

description.en: An online game addict Liu Feng got transferred into a world of magic and swords by accident. As he can neither use magic nor douqi, people looked down on him. Originally thinking he'll be able to cheat his way to his life's peak with the sword saint occupation, he was scolded by the natives so badly he questioned life. Can he really continue surviving in this land where danger is everywhere and become someone who's strong enough to control the fate of his life?
description.pt-br: O garoto viciado em Internet Liu Feng acidentalmente cruzou o mundo da espada e da magia. Ele não pode usar magia e não tem vingança. Ele foi ridicularizado como um “artista marcial demoníaco”. Ele pensava que se despertasse no jogo as habilidades da profissão de espadachim, poderia trapacear no auge da vida, mas desconfiava da vida dos indígenas locais. Em um continente cheio de crises, ele pode realmente sobreviver e se tornar um homem forte que controla seu próprio destino?

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.
A Female Knight unexpectedly swaps bodies with the Goblin getting ready to assault her. How will they both deal with this sudden gender and species change?

A novice cook with a thuggish face joins a wizard’s restaurant!
Novice cook Onijima, who was transported to another world after being run over by a truck, ends up working and living in a restaurant run by the strongest wizard in the world.
A fantasy story about working in another world, unfolded with the help of a merry band of demi-human colleagues!

altTitles.en: To Another World on my Own!
Go to A Different World On Your Own!
Going to Another World on Your Own!

altTitles.ja: 自力で異世界へ！ ～優しい仲間と一緒に異世界生活を満喫します～

description.en: Tarou Satu, a young man who longed for an otherworldly adventure since a child and devoted his youth to finding it, finally goes to another world on his own. However, things did not go well for him, as his previous life’s memories were about to be erased by God. Despite that, he almost dies during his reincarnation process, which allows him to fulfil the condition for a special ability and luckily, keep his old memories. From there, the now reincarnated Tauro Satu, grows up by using his brains and efforts while gradually developing his mysterious skill, Garbled Text, which everyone thought to be completely useless.

In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en: Anthology horror series detailing the "Round of 100 Ghost Stories", an old folktale believed to originate from Japan retold through the lens of Yuuma, a boy who lives in a troubled household. Often used as a test of courage where participants tell one hundred supernatural stories and blow out one candle then look at themselves in the mirror after they finish each story. When the one-hundredth candle is blown out, it is said that ghosts and demons are summoned to our world.
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

description.en:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.

altTitles.ja: 神田ごくら町職人ばなし

altTitles.en: Tales of Craftsmen from Kanda Gokurachou

description.en:
Cooper, swordsmith, dyemaster, tatami stitcher, plasterer.
Stories about the skills and spirit of master craftsmen, portrayed in loving and faithful detail that lets you take a glance at the everyday lives of the artisans of the Edo period.

In the year 2008, high school girl Sakura Minamoto is abruptly killed in a traffic accident. Ten years later, Sakura, along with six "legendary" girls from various eras of Japan's history, are brought back as zombies by a man named Kotaro Tatsumi, who seeks to save the Saga prefecture by putting together an all-zombie idol group.

altTitles.fr: Etes-vous Prêts à tout le monde?

altTitles.ja: みなさまエト・ヴ・プレ？

description.en: Chika Kuwabara pretty much drifts through life with no purpose, her days spent at arcades or getting into petty fights. But one day, she witnesses someone practicing fencing in the school gymnasium. That glimpse begins to awaken something deep inside her!

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Isso Anata ga Todome wo Sashite

altTitles.ja: いっそあなたがトドメを刺して

altTitles.ja-ro: Isso Anata ga Todome o Sashite

altTitles.en: Better You Give Me The Final Blow

description.en:
Ichika is a female college student who wants to have a normal relationship, but is often judged by her appearance. One night at a drinking party she attended, hoping to have a wonderful encounter, she met Kousei who was kind to her. She is attracted to him because they got the same interest, enjoys talking with him and he likes her just the way she is — but she didn't know he had a secret no one knows about. 

(Source: heartbuzz2d)
description.pt-br: Ichika é uma estudante universitária do sexo feminino que deseja ter um relacionamento normal, mas muitas vezes é julgada pela sua aparência. Uma noite, numa festa em que ela participou, esperando ter um encontro maravilhoso, ela conheceu Kousei, que foi gentil com ela. Ela se sente atraída por ele porque eles têm os mesmos interesses, gosta de conversar com ele e ele gosta dela do jeito que ela é — mas ela não sabia que ele tinha um segredo que ninguém conhece.

description.en: The highly popular Korean novel is finally getting a long-awaited comic adaptation! Yuri, a serious and ordinary college student, suddenly finds herself noticed by the heir of a major conglomerate and begins living a life where she is referred to as "Madam"…!? At first, Yuri is afraid of his cold demeanor, but gradually she begins to see various sides of him…? Yuri's exciting and new daily life is about to unfold now!

altTitles.en: The Mob Boss’s Daughter and Her Caretaker

altTitles.vi: Con Gái Ông Trùm Băng Đảng và Người Trông Trẻ

altTitles.pt-br: O guia da Yakuza para babás

description.en:
Kirishima Tooru, Age 28, Sakuragi Group’s wakagashira.
Happily enjoys doing as he pleases because it’s the world of organized crime, he earned the title of “The Demon of the Sakuragi Group.”

Then one day, he ends up in charge of his boss’s only daughter!?   
An independent young lady and good-looking yakuza brute’s heartwarming (?) comedy!
description.pt-br: Kirishima Tooru, 28 anos, wakagashira do Grupo Sakuragi. Felizmente gosta de fazer o que bem entender, porque é o mundo do crime organizado, ele ganhou o título "O Demônio do Grupo Sakuragi". Então um dia, ele acabou encarregado da filha única do chefe?!

description.en:
At a certain late-night convenience store, an old man who was a little unreliable, but a little reliable, had a part-time job. 

The long-awaited serialization of the 14th Kamikaze Award Honorable Mention, which is a hot topic on Twitter!

title.en: I Think I Have Transmigrated Somewhere

altTitles.ko: 제가 어딘가 빙의를 한 것 같은데요.

altTitles.en: I Have Possessed the Body of the Protagonist
I Think I've Been Possessed Somewhere

description.en:
Even though the harsh reality feels like living as a beggar, to think that the end would be death from overworking!
If it’s going to end like this, I should’ve been in a lot of relationships, but wait,
oh my... who are you in the mirror?

I’m a little flustered but this body… it’s really pretty!
It feels like I’ve been transmigrated into a romance fantasy novel.
Since I’m already like this, should I enjoy the romance while I’m at it?

“But which novel did I get transmigrated into?”

I’ve read dozens of books where the ‘Northern Duke’ and ‘Childhood Friends’ exist,
I’ve read so many with a black-haired male lead and a blonde female lead,
Ah~ I don’t know!! For now, let’s start by conquering the male characters!

“I already have a promised marriage."

“I volunteered for the Western Guard. We won’t be able to meet for several years.”
What is this, is this really a romance fantasy novel? Why is everyone running away?!
In the first place… was I really transmigrated as the female lead?

What kind of novel is this!!!!
<It Seems I’ve Transmigrated Somewhere>
description.pl:
Uwielbiam powieści romantyczno-fantastyczne, a nawet trafiłam do jednej z nich.
"W każdym razie, do której książki się przeniosłam?"
Myślę, że przeczytałam około 20 książek z brązowowłosymi pokojówkami z piegami,
Myślę, że przeczytałem około 20 książek z południową damą, która poślubia zimnego księcia z północy,
I wydaje się, że jest więcej książek z czarnowłosymi mężczyznami i blondynkami?
"Czekaj, czy to w ogóle prawda, że zmieniłam się w główną bohaterką?"
Nie, myślę, że to może nawet nie być romans fantasy?

title.en: The Strongest Chef in Another World

description.en: Kang Taeyang, a chef who chased his dreams. One day, he lost everything due to a single choice. But an opportunity came to Taeyang, who was spending hopeless days working odd jobs. [Aurora is hiring employees.] A single line of text changed everything for him!

It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.
A comic about getting yourself a boyfriend... or multiple boyfriends! Four college students begin a polyamorous relationship and navigate the adventure that is their dating life!
description.pt-br: Uma história em quadrinhos sobre conseguir um namorado… Ou vários namorados! Quatro estudantes universitários iniciam um relacionamento poliamoroso e navegam na aventura que é suas vidas amorosas!
